1.title: You submit a request

2.title: We contact you
2.description: A manager clarifies trip details, answers all questions, and reserves a seat

3.title: Payment for services
3.description: Pay in the way that is most convenient for you

4.title: We carry out the transfer
4.description: Arrive at the specified place and time — your trip will be comfortable, safe, and on time

5.title: Customer support
5.description: 24/7 support from Mon-Fri before, during, and after the trip — we are in touch with you

6.title: Loyalty program
6.description: Come back again and get discounts, bonuses, or priority booking.

benefits.title: From this moment, you no longer need to:

1.title: Comfort and safety
1.description: Comfort class minibuses are equipped with comfortable electrically adjustable seats, air conditioning and seat belts for maximum convenience during your trip. A technical inspection is carried out before each trip to ensure complete safety on the road.

2.title: Multimedia
2.description: Our minibuses are equipped with a TV and a modern multimedia system, allowing you to watch movies or listen to music during the trip. This creates a pleasant atmosphere in the cabin and makes the journey less tiring.

3.title: Experienced drivers
3.description: Our drivers have many years of experience in international transportation, know the routes well and always follow the traffic rules. They undergo regular checks to ensure the peace and safety of passengers on every trip.

4.title: Wi‑Fi and charging on the go
4.description: Comfort class minibuses offer free Wi‑Fi and USB/Type‑C chargers at every seat, so you can stay online and use your gadgets without restrictions while traveling.

1.title: Comfort and safety
1.description: Luxury class minibuses feature spacious seats with electric adjustment and leg support for maximum comfort even on long trips. Blankets are provided for passengers, and a spacious refrigerator is available in the cabin. A full technical inspection is carried out before each trip to ensure a high level of safety and reliability on the road.

2.title: Multimedia
2.description: The cabin has a large LED TV with a modern multimedia system and high-quality sound. During the trip, movies, music or a calm background environment are available — for a comfortable mood throughout the entire route.

3.title: Experienced drivers
3.description: Drivers of luxury class minibuses have more than 10 years of transportation experience. They care not only about safe driving but also about making your trip pleasant from the very first minute.

4.title: Wi‑Fi and charging on the go
4.description: Luxury class minibuses offer high-speed Wi‑Fi, and each seat has USB, Type‑C, and a 220V outlet for charging laptops, tablets, or smartphones. You stay connected and productive even on the go.

1.title: European level of service
1.description: Just like in European transport companies

2.title: Comfort in every detail
2.description: Everything is designed for your convenience during the trip

3.title: Fast support
3.description: Our managers are available on Viber/WhatsApp/Instagram from Monday to Friday

4.title: Convenient boarding points
4.description: Our routes are designed so that it is always easy for you to reach

items.name: Viktoriia Vitaliivna
items.text: Very satisfied with the cooperation with 'World of Modern Transportation'. Fast, organized, without unnecessary hassle. The driver arrived on time, communication was clear and prompt. The items were delivered intact and undamaged, well packaged. The price is reasonable. I recommend this company to anyone looking for a reliable carrier.

items.name: Oleksandr Petrovych
items.text: Excellent service! The driver arrived exactly at the appointed time, the vehicle was clean and comfortable. The trip went smoothly, and the rest stops were convenient. The price is fair for such quality service. I will definitely use it again.

items.name: Mariia Ivanivna
items.text: I traveled with the company for the first time and was very satisfied. The driver was professional and attentive, and the route was optimal. The bus was modern and had all the necessary amenities. I recommend it for trips to Europe.

items.name: Andrii Serhiiovych
items.text: A great company for transportation! The driver was experienced, and the vehicle was in excellent condition. The trip was comfortable, with stops in convenient places. The price is reasonable for such quality service.

items.name: Tetiana Oleksandrivna
items.text: Very satisfied with the quality of service. The driver was polite and professional, and arrived on time. The bus was clean and comfortable. The trip went without problems. I recommend this company to everyone.

first.title: 7 years on the market
first.description: We have extensive experience and thousands of successful trips across Ukraine and Europe.

second.title: Modern minibuses
second.description: Comfortable interiors, multimedia, air conditioning, Wi‑Fi and charging — everything for your convenience.

fourth.title: Transparent communication
fourth.description: No hidden fees. We clearly explain trip conditions and prices

fifth.title: Easy booking
fifth.description: The application takes up to 3 minutes, and you receive all details via a convenient messenger

sixth.title: Real communication — no bots
sixth.description: All requests are handled by real managers who truly understand your needs and respond promptly.

faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS FROM OUR CLIENTS

items.title: How long does transportation to Europe take?
items.description: It depends on the destination country. For example, to Poland — 1–2 days, to Germany — 2–3 days, to Italy or France — up to 5 days.

items.title: What documents are required for the trip?
items.description: You need a foreign passport, visa (if required), insurance, and other documents depending on the destination country.

items.title: Can I transport pets?
items.description: Yes, we provide pet transportation services. Relevant documents and veterinary certificates are required.

items.title: What vehicles are used for transportation?
items.description: We use comfort and luxury class vehicles to ensure maximum passenger comfort.

items.title: Can I order a private transfer?
items.description: Yes, we provide private transfer services upon prior request.

items.title: How do I book a trip?
items.description: Booking can be made via our website, by calling us, or by writing in messengers.

items.title: Do you provide package delivery services?
items.description: Yes, we also provide package delivery services between Ukraine and European countries.

items.title: Which countries do you serve?
items.description: We serve routes Ukraine — Poland — Germany — Netherlands — Belgium and other European countries.

articles.title: Rules for transporting belongings to Europe: what you need to know
articles.description: International transportation of belongings to European Union countries is a process regulated by both Ukrainian legislation and EU regulations. If you are planning a move or transporting personal items, it is important to familiarize yourself with the rules in advance to avoid delays at the border, fines, or even confiscation of the cargo...

articles.title: How to properly prepare documents for a trip to Europe
articles.description: Preparing documents for a trip to European Union countries requires attention to detail. The success of your move and compliance with all necessary legal requirements depend on properly prepared documents...

articles.title: Transporting pets: specifics and requirements
articles.description: Transporting pets between countries has its own specifics and requirements. For successful transportation, it is necessary to follow veterinary standards and have the relevant documents...

articles.title: Choosing the optimal route for transportation to Europe
articles.description: Choosing the right route for transportation to Europe can significantly affect travel time, cost, and comfort. Let's look at the key factors to consider when planning a route...

articles.title: Cargo insurance in international transportation
articles.description: Cargo insurance is an important aspect of international transportation. Properly arranged insurance will protect your belongings from damage, loss, or delays en route...

about.title: About the company
about.p1: We specialize in passenger transportation to Poland, Germany, the Netherlands and Belgium. Our routes are designed to provide maximum comfort and safety during your journey.
about.p2: We strive to make every trip easy and carefree.
